passages.text:
//You are struck by how empty it is, compared to the street outside. The windows are dimmed and smoke and vapor cling to the low ceiling. Only one window is open, but not letting in much light. As you look around, you see Horace poke in his head through the window, looking around. 

A small humanoid dressed in fur and cloth sits at the bar, gazing deep into their drink. Behind the bar, a surly woman with multiple arms is cleaning glasses. She looks at you briefly as you enter.

At a table with two holographic cowgirls sits an androgynous figure in plain clothing. They are concentrating on the poker game and don't notice you.//

[[Approach the bar. ->ApproachBar]]

[[Stride over to the bar. ->ApproachBarPumped]]

[[Approach the table. ->ApproachNona]]

[[Walk to the poker table.. ->ApproachNonaPumped]]

[[Approach Horace ->ApproachHorace]]

[[Stand around, unsure of yourself. ->StillAshamed]]
passages.name: EnteringTheSaloon

passages.text:
//You approach the bar, doing your best to look like this isn't your first time, ever, doing this.//

{SceneA2.2 Jessie x Berta}
passages.name: ApproachBar

passages.text:
//You approach the poker table.//

{SceneA2.3 Jessie x Nona}
passages.name: ApproachNona

passages.text:
//You walk over to Horace.//

[[Continue. ->WhatAreYouDoing]]
passages.name: ApproachHorace

passages.text:
//You stand near the entrance for a few minutes, trying to muster up the courage to approach the bar, or maybe the poker table. Horace tries to make eye contact with you, but fails. The longer you wait, the worse it gets.//

[[Push yourself to approach the bar. ->ApproachBarAshamed]]

[[Take a few steps towards the poker table. ->ApproachNonaAshamed]]

[[Linger and avoid eye-contact. ->SebastianEnters]]

links.name: Push yourself to approach the bar.
Take a few steps towards the poker table.

{SceneA2.3 Jessie x Nona}
passages.name: ApproachNonaPumped
WhatAreYouDoing

passages.text:
Uhm, okay, Horace.

[[Approach the Bar. ->ApproachBar]] 

[[Approach the poker table. ->ApproachNona]]
passages.name: OkayHorace

passages.text:
//A few people come in to have a quick chat with Berta, but not much happens until a young man in a beautiful red dress comes down the stairs. He moves with graceful, quick steps over to the Bartender, leaning over the counter to give her a peck on the cheek. She gives him a slight smile, before directing his attention over to you and talking to him a little.//

[[Smile at him. ->SmileAtSeb]]

[[Tip your hat. ->TipHatAtSeb]]

[[Quickly look away when he looks over. ->AvoidSebEye]]

links.name: Quickly look away when he looks over.

TipHatAtSeb

SebComesTrueInfo

SebAvoidbadInfo
SebComesBadInfo

passages.name: Ending

passages.text:
//You look around the Saloon.//

[[Continue.->EnteringTheSaloon]]

[[Continue. ->AfterTalkingNona]]

[[Continue. ->AfterTalkingBerta]] 

[[Continue. ->TalkedToBoth]]
passages.name: You Look Around

passages.text:
//The Saloon is still pretty empty. The windows are dimmed and smoke and vapor cling to the low ceiling. Only one window is open, but not letting in much light. Horace frame is still standing there, his eyes displaying the cross-lingual sign "AFK". 

A small humanoid dressed in fur and cloth sits at the bar, gazing deep into their drink. Behind the bar, a surly woman with multiple arms is cleaning glasses. She looks at you briefly as you enter.

Nona and Horace are deep into their card game. At one point, you are pretty sure you hear Nona laugh out loud.//

[[Approach the bar. ->ApproachBar]]

[[Stride over to the bar. ->ApproachBarPumped]]

[[Stand around, unsure of yourself. ->StillAshamed]]
passages.name: AfterTalkingNona

passages.text:
//The Saloon is still pretty empty. The windows are dimmed and smoke and vapor cling to the low ceiling. Only one window is open, but not letting in much light. Horace is peeking inside. He's watching the poker game.

A small humanoid dressed in fur and cloth sits at the bar, gazing deep into their drink. Behind the bar, the bartender is still cleaning glasses.

At a table with two holographic cowgirls sits an androgynous figure in plain clothing. They are concentrating on the poker game and don't notice you.//

[[Walk to the poker table. ->ApproachNonaPumped]]

[[Stand around, unsure of yourself. ->StillAshamed]]
passages.name: AfterTalkingBerta
TalkedToBoth
